title.rendered: Team felicitation for exemplary project completion

content.rendered: Dilip Sharma, Executive VP and Rahul Kalra, TTE – Projects Divisional Manager, felicitated the projects team of TTE on the successful completion of the Deira Waterfront Project for Empower. The upgradation of the semi-permanent district cooling plant included civil and MEP works and transportation of chillers from International Media Production Zone (IMPZ) to Deira. The team handed over the project in a record time of three months and received appreciation and positive feedback from the client.
